name: Kmusicplay -  next generation Music Player for ubuntu
tagline: Your entire music and video collection in one place. Play any audio / video  file without any obstacle.  kMusicplay support literally any type of music file, from HD or lossless files (like FLAC, ALAC, WAV, etc), to popular compressed or lossy files (like MP3, AAC, etc). kMusicplay also support all video formats and play them seamlessly with the all new Video mode.  kMusicplay  is elegant ,powerful, with so many controls . Most Important feature kMusicplay is  lightweight app is totally written in Qml and uses Ubuntu touch UI components to draw GUI hence most lightweight and fast GUI based media player ever . In App animation and transitions takes the media player to new level . You can save Last Played Tracks so you never need to load tracks again and again , kMusicplay  grabs Album art , Lyrics and other details  of currently playing song on the fly with its all  new metadata interpretor  Klyric Engine beta  , so many other features like slide to remove song from play-list ,  Playlist Quick Filter, with all basic features a music player have are available. If you love app and want more features please give five stars and provide your features request and feedbacks by  commenting after installing app. If for some reasons app didn't work properly then provide the feedbacks by emailing me. Thanks,
body:
### Welcome to Official website of KMusicplay.
Your entire music and video collection in one place. Play any audio / video  file without any obstacle. 
kMusicplay support literally any type of music file, from HD or lossless files (like FLAC, ALAC, WAV, etc), to popular compressed or lossy files (like MP3, AAC, etc).
kMusicplay also support all video formats and play them seamlessly with the all new Video mode. 
kMusicplay  is elegant ,powerful, with so many controls . Most Important feature kMusicplay is  lightweight app is totally written in Qml and uses Ubuntu touch UI components to draw GUI hence most lightweight and fast GUI based media player ever . In App animation and transitions takes the media player to new level . You can save Last Played Tracks so you never need to load tracks again and again , kMusicplay  grabs Album art , Lyrics and other details  of currently playing song on the fly with its all  new metadata interpreter  Klyric Engine beta  , so many other features like slide to remove song from play-list ,  Playlist Quick Filter, with all basic features a music player have are available.
If you love app and want more features please give five stars and provide your features request and feedbacks by  commenting after installing app. If for some reasons app didn't work properly then provide the feedbacks by emailing me.

### KMusicplay is Entirely Written in QML
KMusicplay is totally written in Qt's markup language called QML , 
It consists more than 4000 lines of code totally hand written by Keshav Bhatt.
The whole program uses various Qt's and Ubuntu UI toolkit's modules which can be found in default ubuntu repository .
Some Important functionalities are implemented using these libraries :

*QtQuick 2.0    
*Qt.labs.folderlistmodel 1.0    
*QtQuick.Dialogs 1.0    
*QtQuick.Controls 1.0    
*Ubuntu.Components 1.1    
*QtMultimedia 5.0    
*Ubuntu.Components.ListItems 1.0 as ListItem    
*QtGraphicalEffects 1.0     
*Ubuntu.Components.Popups 0.1    
*QtQuick.XmlListModel 2.0    
*QtQuick.LocalStorage 2.0    
*QtQuick.Layouts 1.0    
*QtSystemInfo 5.0    


### KMusicplay can play any video 
KMusicPlay uses Qt's multimedia module version 5.0 to play any media format seamlessly. And it provide a beautiful shell to control playback of media with easy and quick controls.
  

### Authors and Contributors
The whole project from day one is maintained by Keshav Bhatt(@keshavbhatt).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with using or installing KMusicplay? Contact Keshav Bhatt at keshavnrj@gmail.com 
or find him on twitter at @keshavmail68

Contribute to Project by creating an issue and providing a suitable solution to problem.

Thanks .
